title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects I don't understand it.
OB: When I try to view the scoped type hierarchy for a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant), I get the message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars.
SR: To reproduce the issue, 1. Open a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant) in the software. 2. Attempt to view the scoped type hierarchy. 3. Observe the message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
